text: You feel the mist react to you and a shape appears.
The mist reacts to you and a hazy figure condenses.
A shape appears in the mist that reminds you of a figure from a nightmare.
You see a shape form in the mist that reminds you of a dream monster.
You see a shape form in the mist that reminds you of a creepy man that followed you when you were younger.
You see a shape form in the mist that reminds you of a teacher that hated you.
The mist thickens.
The mist feels slightly stronger and more alive.
You blink and there is dense mist as far as you can see, which is much less than it used to be.
In an instant a thick mist descends upon the world, far too fast to be natural.  Or are you finally losing it?.
